text:
Erica Yohn (October 1, 1928 – January 27, 2019) was an American actress.
Yohn had many small parts in movies, such as "Pee-wee's Big Adventure", and television shows, such as "Rhoda", "ER", "Murphy Brown", "Quantum Leap" and "Kojak".
She had recurring roles on "The Famous Teddy Z", "State of Grace", "Beverly Hills, 90210", and "Picket Fences". She voiced Fievel and Tanya Mousekewitz's mother in "An American Tail" and its sequels.
Yohn died on January 27, 2019 in North Hollywood, California at the age of 90.
Personal life.
Yohn was married to actor Tom Rosqui, who died in 1991, aged 62, from cancer.
